DOC.brief_summary: This 6 arm study evaluate efficacy safety different dos P38 Inhibitor ( 4 ) patient RA currently inadequate clinical response methotrexate . Patients randomize receive P38 Inhibitor ( 4 ) ( 50,150 300 qd po , 25 75 bid po ) placebo , remain stable dose methotrexate . The anticipated time study treatment < 3 month , target sample size 100-500 individual .
